item.title: tic-tac
item.description: #include <iostream> #include <fstream> #include <unistd.h> #include <sys/stat.h> int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { if (argc != 2) { std::cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " <filename>" << std::endl; return 1; } std::string filename = argv[1]; std::ifstream file(filename); struct stat statbuf; // Check the file's status information.
